blogPost.excerpt: RemNote is the all-in-one workspace for note-taking, learning, organizing thoughts, and growing knowledge. It’s built for students, creators, organizers, and anyone looking for thinking superpowers.
blogPost.body: RemNote is the all-in-one workspace for note-taking, learning, organizing thoughts, and growing knowledge. It’s built for students, creators, organizers, and anyone looking for thinking superpowers.
blogPost.title: RemNote - Your thinking and learning workspace.
blogPost.author: Martin Schneider

localize.description: RemNote是一款集记事、学习、整理思路、增长知识于一体的工作空间。它是为学生、创客、组织者和任何寻求思维超能力的人打造的。
localize.tagline: 你的思维和学习工作空间。

localize.description: RemNote是一款集記事、學習、整理思路、增長知識於一體的工作空間。它是爲學生、創客、組織者和任何尋求思維超能力的人打造的。
localize.tagline: 你的思維和學習工作空間。

previous.excerpt: LivingWriter is the best writing app available right now. It takes all the features of Scrivener and other such apps and makes it all modern, clean and beautiful. Start your book, plot your book, write your book, and organize your book all in one place.
previous.title: LivingWriter - The Best Writing App - All the features for novel writing in one clean package.

localize.description: LivingWriter是目前最好的写作应用。它采用了Scrivener和其他此类应用的所有功能，并将其变得现代、简洁、美观。开始你的书，策划你的书，写你的书，组织你的书都在一个地方。
localize.tagline: 小说写作的所有功能都在一个简洁的包里。

localize.description: LivingWriter是目前最好的寫作應用。它採用了Scrivener和其他此類應用的所有功能，並將其變得現代、簡潔、美觀。開始你的書，策劃你的書，寫你的書，組織你的書都在一個地方。
localize.tagline: 小說寫作的所有功能都在一個簡潔的包裏。

next.excerpt: LT Browser is the perfect tool for designers, developers, and enthusiastic amateurs who want to create great-looking & well-performing responsive websites or web apps. Instantly View, Build, and Debug your website on 45+ mobile, tablet, & desktop viewports.
next.title: LT Browser - Next-gen browser to build, test & debug mobile websites

localize.description: LT浏览器是设计师、开发人员和热心的业余爱好者想要创建外观漂亮、性能良好的响应式网站或网络应用的完美工具。在45个以上的移动、平板和桌面视口上即时查看、构建和调试你的网站。
localize.tagline: 用于构建、测试和调试移动网站的下一代浏览器。

localize.description: LT瀏覽器是設計師、開發人員和熱心的業餘愛好者想要創建外觀漂亮、性能良好的響應式網站或網絡應用的完美工具。在45個以上的移動、平板和桌面視口上即時查看、構建和調試你的網站。
localize.tagline: 用於構建、測試和調試移動網站的下一代瀏覽器。
